# Tender Announcement: Fort Smith Hwy 58 Gravel Resurfacing, Wood Buffalo National Park
## Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0165/A

Colleagues, a tender opportunity has been made available by Parks Canada for the resurfacing of 8,000 cubic meters of 25 mm crushed gravel from KM 40 to KM 60 on Highway 58 in Wood Buffalo National Park.

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0165/A
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 26, 2023 at 16:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** September 26, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** October 5, 2023
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional

### Tender Description

The Gravel Resurfacing Contract requires the hauling and compacting of 8,000 cubic meters of 25 mm crushed gravel from KM 40 to KM 60 on Highway 58 in Wood Buffalo National Park. The Contractor must complete this work on a public road.

### Instructions to Tenderers

To be eligible for this tender, all tenderers must:

* Submit their bid via email or fax. Bids received by telephone, in-person or via courier will not be accepted.
* Use the email address **soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca** for all correspondence.
* Ensure that their bid documents are attached to their email, with a maximum file size of 15 megabytes.

### All Enquiries Must Be Made in Writing

Tenderers are required to submit all enquiries related to this tender in writing, and must be received no later than five (5) business days prior to the date of the tender closing.

### Important Information

* National Parks Regulations require all work to be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules and regulations set out in the National Park Act.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring that their bid is complete and meets all conditions outlined in the tender package.
* Parks Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

The documents for tender are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

The tender package includes three documents:

* ITT-EN - 5P468-23-0165 - Fort Smith
